definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Thankfully, I have a trusted seller in Shenzen.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我在深圳有个可信赖的卖家。

sentences.english: Buyers of protection also have to find sellers—banks, say, or hedge funds.
sentences.chinese: 保险的购买者也必须找到卖家，例如银行或对冲基金。

sentences.english: The broken down according to the seller to give you an explanation.
sentences.chinese: 把破损的照下来让卖家给你个解释。

sentences.english: I'll just have to sell up now to get some ready cash.
sentences.chinese: 我必须变卖家产才能得到现金。

sentences.english: With no money to lay out he intends to rob the drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 因为没有钱支付交易，他有意打劫毒品卖家。

sentences.english: So sellers tend to keep quiet until too late.
sentences.chinese: 因此，卖家倾向于保持安静，直到太迟为止。

sentences.english: If the touch early warning line, export pace easily remind sellers adjust replenishment.
sentences.chinese: 倘若触碰预警线，出口易会提醒卖家调整补货步调。

sentences.english: Now regular mail is by no means the top choice for shoppers in terms of timeliness.
sentences.chinese: 现在为省时卖家会首选平邮。

sentences.english: We can only pray that Microsoft and all the other software vendors will agree.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能祈盼微软和别的软件卖家会同意喽。

sentences.english: To dress very disappointed but excellent service.
sentences.chinese: 东西蛮好，卖家服务也很好。

sentences.english: Here you can discuss your investment, trade experience and so on.
sentences.chinese: 买家和卖家交易及投资的经验交流与心得。

sentences.english: This tells buyers that they are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 以此告诉卖家这些供销商是值得信赖的。

sentences.english: Ah Wei said the price the seller will go into just a physical store.
sentences.chinese: 阿伟说，涨价会把卖家逼到实体店里去。

sentences.english: A cricket dealer shows off one of his fighters in a ceramic pot.
sentences.chinese: 一位卖家正在展示一只瓷碗中的打斗蟋蟀。

sentences.english: I quickly notified the seller of my error.
sentences.chinese: 我立即告知卖家，自己是写错了。

sentences.english: I always received the item I bided successfully on time as the seller promise.
sentences.chinese: 我过去都能于卖家所承诺的时间内收到拍卖品。

definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
to return a product for another item
Taobao Marketplace, a Chinese website for online shopping
